page.title: 13Education
page.content: There are no schools in the area. From Kelfield children aged from 5 to 11 years old are taken by bus to Riccall Primary School, and from 11 to 16 they attend Barlby High School, which is a Comprehensive. { From Stillingfleet they are {transported to Naburn Primary School {and Fulford Comprehensive. Sixth form education is available at either Selby Tertiary College or York College of Arts and Technology. { Children aged 5 to 11 from Acaster {Selby go to Appleton Roebuck Primary; {they transfer to the Comprehensive at {Tadcaster at the age of 11. Sixth form {education is available there. There are a very limited number of adult education classes at Stillingfleet Institute, all other further and adult education has to be gained at Selby or York.
